name: Gomoku ++ HD
description:
Gomoku is a board game that not only intersting, but also enhance thinking ability and intelligence.

Gomoku is an abstract strategy board game,seems originates from China. The name Gomoku is from Janpanese and introduced to Western later. Winning and losing depends you how to give rivals and set obstacles. Let the five chess in a row on your iPad!



Rules:

Gomoku is also called Five in a Row(5 in a row), Connect five(Connect 5), caro,omok or Go Bang.
This game is traditionally played with go pieces (black and white stones) on a go board (15x15 intersections). Black plays first, and players alternate in placing a stone of their color on an empty intersection. The winner is the first player to get an unbroken row of five stones horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.



Features：

1. Three levels: Easy, Med and Hard, meeting needs of all players.

2. Undo function.

3. Enable to load game progress.Auto-save when exit or phone ring.

4. Challenging computer or play with your friend on the same device, can also play against a friend via bluetooth on two devices.

5. In Game Center, free to play with friends or anyone online.

6. Excellent user interface and exciting sound effects.

7. Finger-touch-offset function.


Let the Gomoku ++ HD helping to improve your thinking ability!
